analyzed: nad pa lan tshva'o //

translated: When a monk eats in the company of a layperson or a novice, he should not let the edge of the begging bowl touch the other personâ€™s hand.ğŸ”½He should not eat while wearing his sandals.

analyzed: nad pas ni lham phud la zan za ba'i tshe sa grang mo la sogs pas gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir lham rkang pa'i 'og tu mnan te bza'/

analyzed: mi na bar zan za ba'i tshe zas 'di dang 'di 'dod ces 'drim pa la bsgo zhing mi bslang /

analyzed: zas za ba'i tshe bsams pa'i rgyud ma brjed par byas te za ba dang thu thu hu hu la sogs pa byas sam ma byas dran par bya skyes pa dang 'dra ba dang / zas bza' ba'i tshe mi gtsang ba las skyes par bsams te mi chags par bza'/
translated: He should eat without forgetting the thought with which he began to eat. He should eat with mindfulness of whether he is eating noisily, with a smacking mouth, or with a slurping sound. He should eat like a newborn child. He should eat without attachment, thinking that the food is produced from impurities.

original: 'bras dang kha zas la sogs pa srin bu dang skra dang mi lpags 'dra bar bsams te mi chags par bsam /
analyzed: 'bras dang kha zas la sogs pa srin bu dang skra dang mi lpags 'dra bar bsams te mi chags par bsam /

analyzed: gyur pa dang / kha zas zos nas sme ba dang mi gtsang bar gyur par bsams te mi chags par bza'/

analyzed: dgra dang / zas kyi phyir gcig la gcig gsod pa dang gnod par byed pas dgra dang 'dra bar bsam /

analyzed: zag pa dang / zas 'di zos nas slad rol che chung lta bur zag ste 'gro bas mi rtag pa dang btsog par bsams te bza'/
translated: Think that, like excrement, this food that you eat will later be excreted as feces and urine, and that it is impermanent and filthy.

original: rkyen dag gis cho ga dang / kha zas 'di ni mi dang phyugs la sogs pas nyon mongs par brtsal zhing rmos pa las skyes pa yin pas mi chags pa dang mi gtsang bar bsams te bza'/

translated: Think that this food is not to be attached to and is filthy, since it is produced from the toil and plowing of humans, cattle, and so forth.

analyzed: brtsal ba dang / las dang nyon mongs pa spyad de zas rnyed pa yin pas dka' ba lta bur bsams te bza'/

analyzed: phyi dro zas zos na'ang nad du 'gyur ba yin te zas 'di zos nas nad du 'gyur ba yin no snyam du bsams te bza'/

analyzed: zas zos @285a * //

analyzed: s'u tra ltag ma ltar gnas brtan gyi tshigs bcad dang chos bshad pa ni zas zos zin nas bya /

original: spangs pa la mi skye /
